question: Give me all news articles and featured articles that are 2000 words long.
sql_query1:
SELECT Articles.title 
FROM Articles
WHERE (Articles.Written_Journalism = "News Article" OR Articles.Written_Journalism = "Feature Article") AND Articles.Word_Count = "2000 words"
sql_query2:
SELECT Articles.title 
FROM Articles
WHERE Articles.Written_Journalism = "News Article" OR Articles.Written_Journalism = "Feature Article" AND Articles.Word_Count = "2000 words"
interpretation1: List all news and featured articles with a 2000 word count.
interpretation2: Show all the news articles and, in addition, only the featured articles that are 2000 words long.
